dc_title_s: Right of way and track map, Erie terminals R.R. undercliff br., operated by Erie terminals R.R., New York division, station 172 + 50 to station 165 + 00
dc_description_s: Map showing terminals and undercliff bridge adjacent to corporate properties for the Erie Railroad.|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|Made by E.F.M., traced by E.F.M., checked by M.S.
